name: Orphan of the Black
description: The Orphan of the Black is a small fey creature characterized by its cunning and manipulative nature, thriving on chaos and violence. It has a lean, agile build that reflects its dexterity.
memorable: It can compel others to attack each other, creating chaotic scenarios in combat.
goals: To incite conflict and chaos among others, leveraging manipulation to gain access to restricted areas.
relations: May be encountered with other chaotic fey or creatures that align with unlawful tactics.
environment: Typically found in dark, chaotic places where manipulation can flourish.
strengths: Possesses high dexterity, allowing it to evade attacks and perform quick maneuvers.
weaknesses: Low physical strength and intelligence limit its direct combat effectiveness.
attacks: Can perform a Slam attack that deals bludgeoning damage; utilizes multiattack for enhanced action.
most_powerful_ability: Incite Violence, compelling nearby creatures to attack each other, fostering chaos.
skills: Has abilities like Forbiddance and Sense Law that aid in manipulation and controlling encounters.
additional_information: Immune to charm and fear effects.
Can pinpoint lawful creatures within close range.
test_queries: chaotic small fey that manipulates others
creature that incites violence among foes
fey creature that thrives on chaos
manipulative fey that can't enter homes
